document_data.mainbody:
ohl was a man that lived in the Western Heartlands of Faer√ªn during the late 15 century DR.
He was a bit of a hot-head, reacting quickly rather than think situations over and plotting a course of action.
While he had little in the way of weapons, Johl could wield a pitchfork like nobodys business.
Johl had two siblings, a brother Demir and sister Mayrina.
Johls sister was devastated in the , when her husband Connor died. Left with an unborn child with little means to care for them, Mayrina fled her brothers care for the Sunlit Wetlands to strike a deal with the old hag that lived in an isolated shack within.
The two brothers followed Mayrinas trail to the wetlands and managed to confront the old woman Ethel before she made it her shack.
